definitions: a person or thing that accepts or receives something

examples.text: he hoped to make the most of being one of the first acceptors of bitcoin in the Sydney marketplace
don't all award accepters memorize what to say beforehand?

shortDefinitions: person or thing that accepts something

definitions: an atom or molecule which is able to bind to or accept an electron or other species

examples.text: some microorganisms can use oxygen as an electron acceptor

shortDefinitions: atom or molecule which is able to bind to

definitions: an acceptor atom forming a positive hole in a semiconductor.
shortDefinitions: such atom forming positive hole in semiconductor
